name: Lampert - 1675 Edicion Rojo - Short Robusto
additionalNotes:
Lampert Cigars are brought to us by Dr. Stefan Lampert from Austria. Lampert was originally conceptualized around a bespoke cigar experience, much like a custom suit, allowing Aficionados to tailor each cigar to their unique preferences. Eventually, the brand would take off and Stefan Lampert would 
Lampert 1675 Ediciónes Azul and Rojo are collaborations between Lampert Cigars and Agrotabacos, a factory that's quickly rising in the cigar community due to Indiana Ortez's exceptionally refined palate.
